clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: For treatment of human sleeping sickness onchocerciasis and other diseases caused by trypanosomes and worms

incompatibilities.description: The risk or severity of Thrombosis can be increased when Darbepoetin alfa is combined with Suramin
The risk or severity of Thrombosis can be increased when Erythropoietin is combined with Suramin
The risk or severity of Thrombosis can be increased when Peginesatide is combined with Suramin
The risk or severity of Thrombosis can be increased when Methoxy polyethylene glycol epoetin beta is combined with Suramin
